channel.description: Topics in the 'Tavern' category This category is for the discussion of Tavern, an open source activitypub server written in Golang.

item.title: Automated tests
item.dc:creator: ngerakines
item.description:
Iâ€™m pleased to introduce Pubco, the automated tests repository for Tavern.

I think that automated testing is going to be essential to keeping test code coverage high, as well as ensuring that long-term federation compatibility. This repository contains all of the scripts and documentation to spin up a multi-instance Tavern cluster with the help of docker-compose and ngrok and execute automated tests using nightwatchjs.

Demo: https://youtu.be/-VmEu-iaBYk

1 post - 1 participant

item.title: About Tavern
item.dc:creator: ngerakines
item.description:
This category is for the discussion of Tavern, an open source activitypub server written in Golang.

This category is great for:

  • Tavern updates, release announcements and news.
  • Questions about how to contribute to, troubleshoot, and operate Tavern.

Project: https://gitlab.com/ngerakines/tavern

Federation: https://gitlab.com/ngerakines/tavern/-/blob/master/FEDERATION.md
